title: Getting Prepared For Promotion | Joel Osteen
itunes:title: Getting Prepared For Promotion | Joel Osteen
description:
It’s natural to want change when things aren't going our way. But sometimes before we can see promotion, we have to pass through a test. If you’ll stay in faith and do the right thing, at the right time, God will promote you. 

Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love.

To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
